name: Topic Research Evaluation
query: Research the post-labor economy concept for a potential essay. Focus on economic frameworks, current thinking, and connection to AI/automation.
expected_behavior: Loads the topic research workflow from Research/workflows/topic.md (to be created)
Executes parallel MCP calls (parallel-task for deep research, perplexity for comprehensive coverage, exa for academic/thought leadership content)
Spawns appropriate agents for topic research (could be tech-researcher + market-researcher, or topic-specific agents)
Identifies key thinkers and their frameworks
Connects topic to cyber•Fund investment thesis
Flags companies or technologies related to this topic
Provides content-ready insights for essays or tweets
Creates topic context file with key sources and thinkers

must_have: Related companies or technologies flagged if applicable
quality_indicators: Academic rigor (papers, books, credible sources cited)
Clear connection to cyber•Fund focus (AI, automation, programmable economy)
Identification of contrarian or emerging viewpoints

test_variants: Research a philosophical/economic topic (post-labor economy, mechanism design)
Research a person (Vitalik's thinking on coordination)
Research an emerging narrative (AI agents + crypto wallets)
Research a technical concept for content (embodied cognition in robotics)
notes: NEW workflow type. Tests ability to research ideas and topics for content creation. Should produce both investment insights AND content-ready material.
